name: csfloat-discount-notifier
description: Get instant desktop notifications when great deals appear on CSFloat
author: jrshutske

scripts.build:exe: pnpm bundle && pkg dist-bundle/app.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/csfloat-notifier-win.exe && node scripts/copy-assets.cjs
scripts.build:exe:macos: pnpm bundle && pkg dist-bundle/app.js --targets node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64 --output build/csfloat-notifier-macos && node scripts/copy-assets.cjs
scripts.build:exe:linux: pnpm bundle && pkg dist-bundle/app.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output build/csfloat-notifier-linux && node scripts/copy-assets.cjs
